column1: '''Norton Truter''' was one of the authors of [[Crack of Doom Software Adventure]].<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/crackofdoom.html Crack of Doom Software Adventure] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 29 December 2010)</ref><ref>[http://www.mobygames.com/game/crack-of-doom Crack of Doom Software Adventure] at Moby Games (retrieved 29 December 2010)</ref>
